text: Eisteufel (Ice Devil) was a wolfpack of German U-boats that operated during the World War II Battle of the Atlantic from 21 June 1942 to 12 July 1942. ==Service== The group was responsible for sinking 13 merchant ships totalling . ===Raiding History=== {| class="wikitable" |- |Date |U-boat |Name of ship |Nationality |Tons |Convoy |- |align="right" |4 July 1942 |align="center"| |align="left"
